question: Who was the first British Prime Minister born in the 20th Century. Also the only PM to have played 1st class cricket?
api_result: The first British Prime Minister born in the 20th century was Sir Edward Heath. He was born on July 9, 1916, and served as Prime Minister from 1970 to 1974. Additionally, he is notable for being the only British Prime Minister to have played first-class cricket.
